data.comment: The match is underway at Luminus Arena.
Koji Miyoshi is on target to give Antwerp a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 19, Paul Onuachu is on target to level the scores at 1-1.
Great play from Daniel Munoz to set up the goal.
Paul Onuachu puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 2-1.
In the minute 23, Daniel Munoz instrumental with a fine assist.
Martin Hongla is booked for the away team.
At Luminus Arena, Ritchie De Laet has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Bram Van Driessche blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 45, Jere Uronen (Genk) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The second-half is underway at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 46, Ivan Leko is making the team's first substitution at Luminus Arena with Jordan Lukaku replacing Simen Juklerod.
Ivan Leko (Antwerp) is making a second substitution, with Aurelio Buta replacing Ritchie De Laet.
Goal! Theo Bongonda extends Genk's lead to 3-1.
In the minute 61, Jordan Lukaku for Antwerp has been booked by Bram Van Driessche and receives a first yellow card.
The away team have replaced Cristian Benavente with Guy Carel Mbenza Kamboleke. This is the third substitution made today by Ivan Leko.
Cyriel Dessers is replacing Paul Onuachu for Genk at Luminus Arena.
In the minute 83, Goal! The away team reduce the deficit to 3-2 through a header from Dieumerci Mbokani.
That's a fine assist from Jordan Lukaku.
Goal! Genk extend their lead to 4-2 through Cyriel Dessers.
In the minute 88, Junya Ito with an assist there.
Full-time! The final score is 4-2.
Domenico Olivieri (Genk) is making a second substitution, with Bryan Limbombe replacing Junya Ito.
Domenico Olivieri is making the team's third substitution at Luminus Arena with Kouassi Eboue replacing Theo Bongonda.
